did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Arizona's Desert as a Health Resort 1977
did.abstract: Typescript (original) of report on the health effects of the Arizona climate. Includes a listing of health resources in southern Arizona.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Arizona's Desert as a Health Resort (AZ 390). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Dr. H. H. Smith, 1979.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Smith, formerly research professor of microbiology, University of Arizona. Brady, formerly Director of Pima County Dept. of Health and Hospital Services.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript (original) of report on the health effects of the Arizona climate. Includes a listing of health resources in southern Arizona.
